'''Meta-ethics''' is the investigation into the nature of ethical concepts and [[proposition]]s. ===Ethical propositions and truth-aptitude===
 
One of the fundamental debates in ethics is between [[cognitivism (ethics)|cognitivists]] and [[non-cognitivism|non-cognitivists]]. Their debate is over the truth-aptitude of ethical propositions.
